configuration.name: verificationToken
configuration.label: Verification token
configuration.description: Token provided to verify that requests are actually coming from Slack (Basic Information -> Verification Token)

configuration.name: slashCommandsEnabled
configuration.label: Slash Commands Enabled
configuration.description: Determines whether a Slash Command script is needed or not.

configuration.name: slashCommandsScript
configuration.label: Slash Commands Script
configuration.description: The script to be executed when an Slash Command request is performed by Slack.

configuration.name: optionLoadEnabled
configuration.label: Option Load Enabled
configuration.description: Determines whether an Option Load script is needed or not.

configuration.name: optionLoadScript
configuration.label: Option Load Script
configuration.description: The script to be executed when an Option Loads request is performed by Slack.

configuration.name: eventsUrl
configuration.label: Events URL
configuration.description: This is the URL you need to set as 'Request URL' in 'Event Subscriptions' page of your app. Keep in mind that the endpoint must be deployed in order to interact with the Slack configuration page. Callback function must be defined on libraries: app.controller.slack.slackEvent

configuration.name: slashCommandsUrl
configuration.label: Slash commands URL
configuration.description: This is the URL you need to set as Request URL in each of your Slash commands. Callback function must be defined on libraries: app.controller.slack.slashCommand

configuration.name: interactiveMessagesUrl
configuration.label: Interactive messages URL
configuration.description: This is the URL you need to set as 'Request URL' in 'Interactive Messages' page of your app.

configuration.name: optionsLoadUrl
configuration.label: Options load URL
configuration.description: This is the URL you need to set as 'Options Load URL' in 'Interactive Messages' page of your app.

events.label: Slack Event
events.name: slackEvent
events.description: Happens when any event from events API is received from Slack.

events.label: Slash Command
events.name: slashCommand
events.description: Happens when a slash command handled by the endpoint is called.

events.label: Interactive Message
events.name: interactiveMessage
events.description: Happens when a button in a message is pushed.
